product_name: Rip Curl Alana Acetate Watch - Women's
long_description: With subtle tortoise detailing, the women's Rip Curl Alana Acetate Watch combines sweet style, water resistance and precise jeweled time keeping. Durable acetate case and soft polyurethane strap prevent corrosion, including the effects of saltwater. Rip Curl Alana Acetate watch resists water to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: With subtle tortoise detailing, the women's Rip Curl Alana Acetate Watch combines sweet style, water resistance and precise jeweled time keeping.
